618760.name: IronBorn
618760.description:
Presentation


IronBorn is the latest RPG by Valkyria, the developer behind Valiant, and published by RPG veterans Aldorlea Games.
Featuring a gameplay and visuals reminiscent of the 16-bit console era, this game is a must-have for fans of old-school RPG.
Take control of Dale and his wolf Snow, have several characters join you on your quest and battle the enemies until emerge victorious!

Plot


What if you discovered that you have the power to stop an evil menace?
What if you discovered that to complete that journey, you would have to face your own brother?

Join Dale and his friends on a quest of self-discovery, friendship and heroism!
Become the IronBorn and save the world!

It's for more than just glory, it's for the humankind.

More Games
